Package zombicide.actor.survivor

Class Survivor

java.lang.Object
zombicide.actor.Actor
zombicide.actor.survivor.Survivor
public class Survivor extends Actor
The Survivor class represents a survivor in the Zombicide game.

A survivor has health points, action points, roles, weapons, tools, and available actions. They can perform various actions such as attacking zombies, moving, searching, and using items.
